hero.heading: Contemporary
hero.copy: If the modern industrial look is more your style, these sleek door options are the perfect match for your home’s clean lines and contemporary design.
hero.direction: What style of garage door do you want?

inspiration.heading: Options that bring the light in.
copy: Contemporary garage doors offer large expanses of glass to brighten your garage. Choose how many window panels per section you prefer, and find a glass option that brings the right amount of outside light in.

next.heading: Next, let’s go over your design options.
next.copy: From windows to unique decorative hardware, you can turn an ordinary garage door into an extraordinary one.
